tweets.author_name: Nick: The Music, The Mem'ries, The Magic
tweets.html:
Everyone's freakin out about #TheWalkingDead and #GameOfThrones and I'm just like "where was Twitter when Buffy was on?!"

— Nick: The Music, The Mem'ries, The Magic (@NICKWALSH) April 1, 2013

yup, i've definitely missed the boat. Not a fecking clue what's happening here. Lotta linen and tits though.#GameOfThrones

— chris o'dowd (@BigBoyler) April 1, 2013

'Game Of Thrones' spoilers don't affect me because even after 20 episodes, I've yet to get any of the characters names straight.

— Evan Kirby (@evankirby) April 1, 2013

Ed Sullivan was terrible tonight.

— Andy Kindler (@AndyKindler) April 1, 2013

Remember: For the next 24 hours, don't trust anything you read on the Internet. Just like usual.

— Daniel Fienberg (@TheFienPrint) April 1, 2013
